name: VLC-Record
body:
# VLC-Record VLC-Record is a tool written in [Qt][10] / C++ to record / play streams from [kartina.tv][1] or other IPTV services using libVLC from the [vlc media player][2]. ---- ## Content * [Help][11] * [Screenshots][12] * [Main Window][13] * [Settings][17] * [Timer Record][23] * [Program Help][24] * [Fullscreen][25] * [Versions][26] * [Features][27] * [Operating Systems][28] * [Download][29] * [Support][31] * [How you can help][32] ---- ## Help An English help is available [here][3]. ## Screenshots ### Main Window #### Normal View ![Main View](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/whole_view.jpg) #### VOD List View ![VOD List](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/vod_list.jpg) #### VOD Details View ![VOD Detail View](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/vod_details.jpg) ### Settings #### Main Settings ![Main Settings](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/settings.png) #### Shortcuts ![Shortcuts](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/shortcuts.png) #### Advanced Settings ![Advanced Settings](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/advanced_settings.png) #### Parental Access ![Parental Access](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/parental_manager_access.png) #### Parental Manager ![Parental Manager](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/parental_manager.png) ### Timer Record ![Timer Record](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/timer_record.png) ### Program Help ![Program Help](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/program_help.jpg) An English help is available [here][3]. ### Fullscreen ![Fullscreen](http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/site/fullscreen.jpg) ## Versions There are different versions available: 1. VLC-Record 2. Kartina.TV 3. Polsky.TV 4. Moi-Dom.TV 5. ... These versions differ not only in branding, but also in functionality. ## Features ###
Features
Timeshiftyes
Recordyes
Timer Recordyes
Supports different SW Playeryes
Archiveyes
VODyes
integrated player windowyes
full screen modeyes
OTRyes
Parental Manageryes
## Operating Systems VLC-Record is available for Windows, Linux (Ubuntu packages available) and Mac OSX 10.6+. If your Linux version isn't supported, have a look at following page: * [How to build VLC-Record on Linux][9] ## Download Get all available versions at the [download section][4]. ### Beta Versions [Here][5] you'll find all available beta versions. If you find any issue there, please contact me! ## Support If you're looking for fast support, please have a look here:
* [Pristavka.de][7] * [Kartina.TV Forum][6] ## How you can help VLC-Record (and such any available branding) is freeware. Nevertheless it is much work to create such a program. Please support me by donating the amount you think it's worth. [PayPal Donation][8] [1]: http://kartina.tv "Kartina.TV Homepage" [2]: http://www.videolan.org "VideoLAN Homepage" [3]: http://vlc-record.coujo.de/gc/help/help_en.html "English Help" [4]: http://rt.coujo.de/downloads/dwnld.php "VLC-Record Downloads" [5]: http://rt.coujo.de "Beta Versions" [6]: http://forum.kartina.tv/topic/16908-kartinatv-player-270 "Kartina.TV support forum" [7]: http://www.pristavka.de/vlc-record "Pristavka.de" [8]: https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=11286909 "Paypal Donation" [9]: https://github.com/Jo2003/vlc_record/wiki/Build-on-Linux "Build on Linux" [10]: http://www.qt.io/ "Qt Homepage" [11]: #help "Help" [12]: #screenshots "Screenshots" [13]: #main-window "Main Window" [14]: #normal-view "Normal View" [15]: #vod-list-view "VOD List View" [16]: #vod-details-view "VOD Details View" [17]: #settings "Settings" [18]: #main-settings "Main Settings" [19]: #shortcuts "Shortcuts" [20]: #advanced-settings "Advanced Settings" [21]: #parental-access "Parental Access" [22]: #parental-manager "Parental Manager" [23]: #timer-record "Timer Record" [24]: #program-help "Program Help" [25]: #fullscreen "Fullscreen" [26]: #versions "Versions" [27]: #features "Features" [28]: #operating-systems "Operating Systems" [29]: #download "Download" [30]: #beta-versions "Beta Versions" [31]: #support "Support" [32]: #how-you-can-help "How You Can Help"
